name: A duck in the sky (but with no diamonds)
name_original: A duck in the sky (but with no diamonds)
description:
A Duck in the sky (but with no diamonds)

PLAY IT IN FULLSCREEN

A very bad game. But you quack in it!

Gameplay time: 1-3 minutes.

Made for "So bad it´s good jam". But with a twist. I suck at making games, so there is nothing good about it.

My very, very first game ever. Made in GDevelop5. Sprites are made in Piskel. It took me way too long to make this crap.

Source is here: https://github.com/VladimirBlazek/Duck_in_the_sky_game/blob/master/README.md
